sentences.english: A whale is a kind of mammal.
sentences.chinese: 鲸是一种哺乳动物。

sentences.english: The whale is a mammal.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼是哺乳动物。

sentences.english: The problem with that theory is that no other mammal has resorted to this method of cooling down.
sentences.chinese: 这一理论的问题在于，没有其他的哺乳动物采取了这种降低体温的方式。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal that drinks milk from its mother’s body when it is young. Humans, dogs, and whales are mammals.

sentences.english: The match had to be postponed until next week.
sentences.chinese: 比赛不得不推迟到下周举行。

sentences.english: His trial has been postponed indefinitely (= no one knows when it will happen ) .
sentences.chinese: 对他的审判被无限期推迟了。

detailed_translations.english: to change the date or time of a planned event or action to a later one

sentences.english: the entrance to a cave
sentences.chinese: 洞穴的入口

detailed_translations.chinese: 使凹陷，使塌落；在…挖洞穴
detailed_translations.english: to hollow out
a large natural hole in the side of a cliff or hill, or under the ground

sentences.english: There seemed to be no logical order to the sections.
sentences.chinese: 这几部分似乎没有逻辑顺序。

sentences.english: Let’s have some order in here.
sentences.chinese: 我们把这里整理一下吧。

sentences.english: The court ordered his release from prison.
sentences.chinese: 法院下令放他出狱。

detailed_translations.english: the way that things or events are arranged in relation to each other, so that one thing is first, another thing is second etc
to tell someone that they must do something, especially using your official power or authority

sentences.english: Prosecution and defence lawyers are expected to deliver closing arguments next week.
sentences.chinese: 原告律师和被告律师下周将要作终结辩论。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to advise people about laws, write formal agreements, or represent people in court

sentences.english: sulphuric acid
sentences.chinese: 硫酸

sentences.english: a juicy apple with a slightly acid flavour
sentences.chinese: 一个多汁、略带酸味的苹果

sentences.english: I was expecting another of his acid remarks, but he remained silent.
sentences.chinese: 我等着他再说一句刻薄的话，但他不吭声了。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance that has a  pH  of less than 7. Strong acids can burn holes in material or damage your skin
having a sharp sour taste

sentences.english: Somebody was beating at the door.
sentences.chinese: 有人在打门。

sentences.english: Brazil were beaten 2–1.
sentences.chinese: 巴西队以1比2告负。

sentences.english: Labour easily beat the Conservatives in the last election.
sentences.chinese: 工党在上一届选举中轻松击败保守党。

detailed_translations.english: to hit sb/sth many times, usually very hard

sentences.english: He questioned McNeil’s fitness for high office.
sentences.chinese: 他质疑麦克尼尔是否适合身居高位。

sentences.english: Running marathons requires a high level of physical fitness.
sentences.chinese: 跑马拉松需要身体十分强健。

detailed_translations.english: the degree to which someone or something is suitable or good enough for a particular situation or purpose

sentences.english: I’m afraid it’s become a matter of economic necessity.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕这已成了一个经济需求的问题。

detailed_translations.english: when something is necessary

sentences.english: a short church service
sentences.chinese: 简短的教堂礼拜仪式

sentences.english: church bells
sentences.chinese: 教堂的钟

detailed_translations.english: a building where Christians go to worship

detailed_translations.chinese: 领…到教堂接受宗教仪式

sentences.english: The village was cut off by floods.
sentences.chinese: 那个村子因洪水而与外界中断了联系。

sentences.english: the worst floods for over fifty years
sentences.chinese: 五十多年来最严重的水灾

sentences.english: Towns and cities all over the country have been flooded.
sentences.chinese: 全国各地的城镇都被淹没了。

detailed_translations.english: a very large amount of water that covers an area that is usually dry
to cover a place with water, or to become covered with water

sentences.english: The guide is being translated into several languages for publication near Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 这本指南正被翻译成好几种语言，准备在圣诞节前后出版。

sentences.english: a delay in the publication of the exam results
sentences.chinese: 考试成绩的延期公布

detailed_translations.english: the act of printing a book, a magazine, etc. and making it available to the public; a book, a magazine, etc. that has been published

sentences.english: He made some highly critical remarks.
sentences.chinese: 他发表了一些严厉的批判性言论。

detailed_translations.english: if you are critical, you criticize someone or something

detailed_translations.chinese: 行为， 举止， 表现

sentences.english: A vote for us is not a wasted vote.
sentences.chinese: 投我们的票是不会白投的。

sentences.english: The proposal was rejected by 19 votes to 7.
sentences.chinese: 那项提议以19票对7票被否决。

sentences.english: policies designed to win votes in the South
sentences.chinese: 旨在赢取南方选票的各项政策

sentences.english: It’s the club secretary that counts the votes.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部干事负责清点选票。

detailed_translations.english: an act of voting in an elec­tion or meeting, or the choice that you make when you vote

detailed_translations.chinese: 提议，使投票；投票决定；公认
detailed_translations.english: to show which person or party you want, or whether you support a plan, by marking a piece of paper, raising your hand etc

sentences.english: Board members met in closed session (= with nobody else present ) .
sentences.chinese: 委员会成员举行了闭门会议。

detailed_translations.english: a formal meeting or group of meetings, especially of a law court or parliament

sentences.english: The main crops were oats and barley.
sentences.chinese: 主要作物是燕麦和大麦。

sentences.english: crops grown for market
sentences.chinese: 为供应市场而种植的作物

sentences.english: Fruit growers are gathering in a bumper crop (= a very large amount of something produced in season ) .
sentences.chinese: 果农正在采摘丰收的果实。

detailed_translations.chinese: 农作物，庄稼；一熟：一季的收成
detailed_translations.english: a plant such as wheat, rice, or fruit that is grown by farmers and used as food

sentences.english: In mathematics, we use many techniques of problem-solving.
sentences.chinese: 在数学中，我们会使用多种方法解题。

sentences.english: He’s a great player, with brilliant technique.
sentences.chinese: 他是个伟大的球员，球技十分精湛。

detailed_translations.english: a special way of doing something

sentences.english: All items entered for the competition must be the entrant's own work.
sentences.chinese: 所有参赛作品必须是参赛者自己的作品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 进入者；新会员；参加竞赛者；新工作者
detailed_translations.english: someone who takes part in a competition

sentences.english: 57 percent complained of work overload.
sentences.chinese: 57%的人抱怨工作负担过重。

detailed_translations.english: too much of sth

sentences.english: the council for civil liberties
sentences.chinese: 公民自由委员会

sentences.english: the UN Security Council
sentences.chinese: 联合国安全理事会

detailed_translations.english: a group of people that are chosen to make rules, laws, or decisions, or to give advice

sentences.english: deputy/vice chairman Barrett serves as vice chairman.
sentences.chinese: 巴雷特担任副主席一职。

detailed_translations.english: someone, especially a man, who is in charge of a meeting or directs the work of a committee or an organization

sentences.english: a railway company
sentences.chinese: 铁路公司

detailed_translations.english: a system of tracks along which trains run, or a system of trains

sentences.english: Employees who refuse to relocate are in breach of contract (= have done something not allowed by their contracts ) .
sentences.chinese: 员工拒绝调动岗位是违反合约的。

detailed_translations.english: an official agreement between two or more people, stating what each will do

sentences.english: This species of plant is becoming increasingly rare.
sentences.chinese: 这种植物越来越罕见。

sentences.english: I only saw Helen on the rare occasions when I went into her shop.
sentences.chinese: 我只有偶尔去海伦店里时才会见到她。

sentences.english: It is very rare for her to miss a day at school.
sentences.chinese: 她很少有哪一天不上学的。

detailed_translations.english: not seen or found very often, or not happening very often

sentences.english: We are pleased to receive your enquiry.
sentences.chinese: 我们很高兴收到您的询问函。

sentences.english: She has taken my enquiry as a personal affront.
sentences.chinese: 她将我的询问当成了人身侮辱。

sentences.english: When fresh supplies come into the market, we can revert to your enquiry.
sentences.chinese: 等新货上市时，我们才能回头考虑你们的询盘。

sentences.english: a thick oak door
sentences.chinese: 一扇厚实的橡木门

sentences.english: a thick slice of homemade bread
sentences.chinese: 一片厚厚的自制面包

sentences.english: He was wearing thick glasses.
sentences.chinese: 他戴着厚厚的眼镜。

sentences.english: short thick fingers
sentences.chinese: 短粗的手指

sentences.english: thick wool socks (= socks that are heavy and warm )
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的羊毛袜子

sentences.english: If you want a thicker blanket, there are more here in the closet.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要更厚的毯子，这个柜子里还有。

sentences.english: The meat is done when the thickest part turns from pink to white.
sentences.chinese: 肉最厚的部分从粉红色变成白色，就说明熟了。

detailed_translations.english: if something is thick, there is a large distance or a larger distance than usual between its two opposite surfaces or sides

sentences.english: Add a little more liquid to the sauce.
sentences.chinese: 在酱汁中再加一点水。

sentences.english: Children take antibiotics in liquid form.
sentences.chinese: 儿童服用液态抗生素。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that is not a solid or a gas, for example water or milk
in the form of a liquid instead of a gas or solid

sentences.english: The women prepared, spun, and dyed the wool.
sentences.chinese: 妇女们将羊毛预备、纺线并染色。

sentences.english: hair dye
sentences.chinese: 染发剂

detailed_translations.english: to give something a different colour using a dye
a substance you use to change the colour of your clothes, hair etc

sentences.english: This was demonstrated in a laboratory experiment with rats.
sentences.chinese: 这点通过在实验室中用老鼠做试验得到证明。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that looks like a large mouse with a long tail

sentences.english: New safety measures were being demanded after last night’s horrific train crash.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚发生严重的火车相撞事故后，民众要求制定新的安全措施。

sentences.english: The new bridge was erected as a temporary measure to replace the one which was destroyed by floods.
sentences.chinese: 建这座新桥是为了临时代替被洪水毁坏的那座桥。

detailed_translations.english: an action, especially an official one, that is intended to deal with a particular problem
